name: Beef Carbonade with Herbs
recipeIngredient: 2 1/4 pounds chuck, blade or fore rib of beef, cut into 2-inch pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Roll the beef in the flour. Melt hte butter in a heavy pan, add the beef in batches and brown it on all sides.
Pour in the hot stock and stir, scraping the bottom of the pan to release any browned bits.
Add the parsley, tarragon, chevril and onion, and season with salt and pepper. Cook gently, covered, for 1 1/2 hours.
